translation.restoreTitle: Get your Mises ID via a Metamask account
translation.restoreTips: Mises ID is restored by entering a mnemonic.
translation.notLogin: Your Mises ID is not connected. Please connect your account.
translation.notRegister: Go to create your Mises ID
translation.createMisesIdTips: If you don't have a Metamask account, please click "create misses ID", We will guide you to create a Metamask account and obtain your Mises ID
translation.connectMisesIdTips: Mises is a blockchain network which supports decentralized ID, storage and social media features. Mises embeds an enhanced Metamask plugin for users to access Mises Chain.
translation.resoreMisesIdTips: Mises ID is a decentralized personal account. You can get your Mises ID via a Metamask account.
translation.createPostsTips: Please enter contents or upload pictures
translation.unloginFollowingsecTitle: Everything you care about will be displayed here.
translation.upLoadFileWarning: Up to 9 image can be uploaded
translation.pictureError: Picture upload failed, please try again
translation.postDelete: Sorry, This content has been delete
translation.postBlock: This user has been blocked by you
translation.usernameError: The user name is illegal. Only letters, numbers, underscores and no more than 25 characters can be used
translation.airdropContentdesc: Verify your Twitter account to check the availability of your airdrop
translation.airdropContentdesc1: Make sure your Twitter account was created before May 1, 2022
translation.airdropSuccessContent: You have receive your Airdrop, thanks for your support!
translation.unloginTitle: Connect to your Mises ID to receive content from your Following
translation.importNFT: Import your NFT List from Wallet
